Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: ググラ
Entry.EnglishText: Gugura

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウン
Entry.EnglishText: Sunnytown

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウン
Entry.EnglishText: Sunnytown

Entry.JapaneseText: 広場への道
Entry.EnglishText: Town Square

Entry.JapaneseText: 広場への道
Entry.EnglishText: Town Square

Entry.JapaneseText: じいさん、ありがとう!! お代はいくらだい？
Entry.EnglishText: Thanks, mister! How much do we owe ya?

Entry.JapaneseText: 恩人からは金は受け取れん。
Entry.EnglishText: I can't accept payment from those who have helped me.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえさんたちは 船の材木も集めてくれたしな。
Entry.EnglishText: You supplied the wood needed for my raft.

Entry.JapaneseText: トヨホウス河に来た時は、 ワシのところへ来い。 いつでも船に乗せてやる。 もちろん、金などいらんぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Come visit me whenever you visit the Toyohose river. My boat is at your service, free of charge!

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう。助かるぜ!! なあ、みんな!!
Entry.EnglishText: Thanks, you're a lifesaver! Right, gang?

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう、ググラじいさん。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you, Gugura.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、またな。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, see you later.

Entry.JapaneseText: よっしゃ！ さっそく、 <Blue>王の盾<White>の追跡開始といこうぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Alright! Time to hunt down the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: 海側の港からバルカ行きの船が 出ているはずだ。 まずそこへ行ってみよう。
Entry.EnglishText: There will be boats bound for Balka at this city's port. Let's head over there.

Entry.JapaneseText: また、その辺で騒ぎが起きているようだな。 どうせまた、ヒューマが何か しでかしたんだろう……まったく……
Entry.EnglishText: It appears there's been another disturbance in the area... I bet it was those darned Huma again...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマはあまり外を歩くな。 問題の原因になるだけだ。 さっさと家に帰れ。
Entry.EnglishText: You shoudn't be walking around outside much, considering you Huma are causing problems. Go home.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんた、ヒューマと連れ立って 何をしているんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: What are you doing travelling alongside Huma?

Entry.JapaneseText: 今の状況では、ガジュマとヒューマが 一緒にいるのは好ましくない…… よく考えてくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: Due to the current situation, now is not a good time for Gajuma to be fraternizing with Huma... Do keep that in mind.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今は特別警戒中だ。 ヒューマは外出するな。
Entry.EnglishText: The town is currently on high alert. You Huma should remain indoors.

Entry.JapaneseText: この音、地震かもしれない。 津波の可能性もある。 外出を控えてくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: If this sound is caused by an earthquake, then there is the possibility a tsunami may occur. Please refrain from going outside.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんた、ヒューマと連れ立って 何をしているんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: What are you doing travelling alongside Huma?

Entry.JapaneseText: 今の状況では、ガジュマとヒューマが 一緒にいるのは好ましくない…… よく考えてくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: Due to the current situation, now is not a good time for Gajuma to be fraternizing with Huma... Do keep that in mind.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今は特別警戒中だ。 ヒューマは外出するな。
Entry.EnglishText: The town is currently on high alert. You Huma should remain indoors.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何が起こるかわからない。 一般市民は、噴水前へ避難するんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: We have no idea what might happen. All civilians should evacuate to the fountain!

Entry.JapaneseText: 街の治安が乱れている。 軍に協力して治安回復に 努めるように！
Entry.EnglishText: This town is in chaos. I recommend that you cooperate with the Army so that order may be restored.

Entry.JapaneseText: この辺りの船では 海は渡れないよ。
Entry.EnglishText: The ships here aren't seaworthy.

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカへ戻る船はないんだ。 戻る時は、北の出口から 歩くしかないね。
Entry.EnglishText: And none of them can take you back to Petnadjanka, either. You'll have to walk to there from the north entrance of town.

Entry.JapaneseText: テルアラ街道のほうへ行くなら 南の出口からだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: And if you're heading towards the Tel'Alla Highway, then you should leave through the southern entrance.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の子？
Entry.EnglishText: You're looking for a girl?

Entry.JapaneseText: この辺りで隠れられそうなのは 船の中くらいだな。 そうでなければ、水の中か……
Entry.EnglishText: If she's hiding around here, then she'd either be in a boat, or in the water...

Entry.JapaneseText: 広場の方が騒がしいが……
Entry.EnglishText: There's quite the commotion over at the town square...

Entry.JapaneseText: お披露目の儀式はいいけどさ、 そんなのを発表する前に、 国民を守ってくれ、って言いたいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: An inauguration ceremony's nice and all, but I wish they'd just prioritize the people's safety before announcing something like that.

Entry.JapaneseText: まったく、何だったんだ、 あのハーフの女は…… 恐ろしいし、気味悪いよな……
Entry.EnglishText: What was up with that Half woman? I was so terrified, she gave me the creeps...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマ…… ううぅ……なんなんだよ、 この気持ちは……近寄るな！
Entry.EnglishText: A Gajuma... Ugh... Why do I feel this way...? Get away from me!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが近づくだけで、 無性に血が騒ぐんだよ…… 憎くてたまらないんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: I can't keep my blood from boiling whenever a Gajuma approaches me... I hate them so much...

Entry.JapaneseText: うう……ガジュマ、 近付くな……！
Entry.EnglishText: Ugh... Gajuma... Stay away from me!

Entry.JapaneseText: 幻……幻の島ねえ…… あまり知られてないが、 あんま海にはくわしくないしな……
Entry.EnglishText: Illusions... Hmm... An Island of Illusions... It may come as a surprise, but I'm not very well versed on things involving the sea...

Entry.JapaneseText: そういや、ベルサス辺りに 昔、海賊たちの根城があったって 話もあるぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: But speaking of the seas... I heard that Belsas used to be a stronghold for pirates back in the day.

Entry.JapaneseText: 海が荒れると、この辺りは あっというまに水浸しになっちまう。 あんたらも気をつけるんだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: This area tends to flood when the seas get rough. You guys should be careful around here.

Entry.JapaneseText: 船に乗るのかい？ 船ったらやっぱ…… 港だろ？
Entry.EnglishText: You're looking for a ship? Wouldn't ships, y'know... be over at the port?

Entry.JapaneseText: さらわれた女の子？ さあ……そんな話は 知らないが……
Entry.EnglishText: Kidnapped girls? I have no idea what you're talking about.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの女の子を 探してる？
Entry.EnglishText: You're looking for a Huma girl?

Entry.JapaneseText: この辺りではそれらしき娘は 見なかったが……？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you see any girls around here...?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだか広場であるみたいだね。 見にいってみるか……
Entry.EnglishText: Looks like there's something happening at the town square. Maybe I should go check it out...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>の儀式…… 行ってみたいけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I'd like to attend the inauguration ceremony on the <Blue>Day of Goldba<White>, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: 定期便で行けないとなると、 ちょっと大変だよなぁ…… 迷うよなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: It's going to be hard with the regular boat services postponed... Not sure if I should go or not...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんた、ヒューマをどう思う？ 俺は、見るだけでも 気分が悪いんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: How do you feel about Huma? Whenever I look at them, I get a bad feeling...

Entry.JapaneseText: 船着場も、種族別にして 欲しいところだよ……
Entry.EnglishText: I wish that the docks were segregated by race...

Entry.JapaneseText: うるせーな、ヒューマが！ あっちの男に話を聞けよ！ あー気分悪い!!
Entry.EnglishText: Shut up, Huma! Go talk to that guy over there! I'm not in the mood!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>幻の島<White>のう…… カレギアの海は島だらけだからな。
Entry.EnglishText: The <Blue>Island of Illusions<White>... The Callegean Sea is probably littered with them.

Entry.JapaneseText: 幻というからには 沈んだんだろうな。
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps it's called an "illusion" because it sank.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>幻の島<White>？ 知らん。あっち行け！
Entry.EnglishText: An <Blue>Island of Illusion<White>? Beats me. Ask someone else!

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカでジルバ様が演説を したんだってな！
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that Lady Zilva gave a speech in Balka!

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺たちガジュマの気持ちを ジルバ様が代弁してくれたんだ。 俺もその場で聞きたかったよ……
Entry.EnglishText: She spoke up about what us Gajuma are feeling. I wish I'd been there...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよ、ヒューマが！ ひとでなしの種族が、 偉そうにしてるんじゃねえぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: What's wrong with you, Huma? You're a race of brutes, stop acting like you own the place!

Entry.JapaneseText: 色んなところでガジュマと ヒューマで争いになってるみたいだが……
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like there are fights breaking out between Huma and Gajuma across the country.

Entry.JapaneseText: ぜひ同胞たちには がんばってほしいね！
Entry.EnglishText: I definitely hope my fellow Gajuma come out on top!

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナールでもガジュマたちが 奮戦してるって話だぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: I've heard that even in Minal, Gajuma are fighting fiercely.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよ、ヒューマが！ ひとでなしの種族が、 偉そうにしてるんじゃねえぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: What's wrong with you, Huma? You're a race of brutes, stop acting like you own the place!

Entry.JapaneseText: このヘンな音……どっかで地震でも 起きてるんじゃないだろうな……？
Entry.EnglishText: This weird sound... Is there an earthquake happening somewhere...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 津波なんて来たら、サニイタウンは あっと言う間に沈んじまう……！
Entry.EnglishText: If a tsunami comes, Sunnytown will be underwater in the blink of an eye!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマが何だってんだ！ 存在そのものが気に食わないんだよ！ とっとと失せろ！
Entry.EnglishText: What the hell do you want from me, Huma? I loathe your very existence. Begone!

Entry.JapaneseText: この空の色は何なんだよ…… どうなっちまうんだよ……
Entry.EnglishText: What's with the sky's color...? What the heck is happening?

Entry.JapaneseText: 仕事の都合で、陸にあがったんだけど、 水の中の世界が懐かしくて…… 時々こうして川や海を見に来るんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: I have to be on land due to work, but I miss being out at sea... Sometimes I come out here to see the river and ocean.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
